Package net.sf.jstuff.xml.xjc

Class FieldInstantiatingPlugin

java.lang.Object
com.sun.tools.xjc.Plugin
net.sf.jstuff.xml.xjc.AbstractPlugin
net.sf.jstuff.xml.xjc.FieldInstantiatingPlugin
public class FieldInstantiatingPlugin extends AbstractPlugin
This plug-in finds fields of types that are defined in the schema and instantiates them even if not specified in the XML. Roughly based on https://github.com/walmir/xjc-inst/blob/master/xjc-plugin/src/main/java/de/jaxbnstuff/xjcplugin/FieldInstantiator.java To enable auto-instantiation use: 
 <schema ... xmlns:FIELD_INST="FieldInstantiatingPlugin" jaxb:extensionBindingPrefixes="FIELD_INST">
 ...
   <element name="connection" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1">
     <annotation>
       <appinfo>
         <FIELD_INST:enabled />
       </appinfo>
     </annotation>
     <complexType>
     ...
 ...
Author:
Sebastian Thomschke
